title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
Beat the eggs with the cheese and pepper.
Drain the pasta and mix quickly with pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spice mix for at least 2 hours.
Grill or bake the chicken until cooked through.
Fry onion and garlic until soft.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken.
